Nvm, was easier than i thought :P
everyone here who is haveing problems with this or any other update, just search google for a hacked game save that has everything unlocked, and then start a New Game + =]

"The Elite Engineering Suit will now appear properly after completing a full-playthrough of the Single Player Campaign."

Well, I want that, but I don't want all suits and items available at zero cost from the very beginning. Sure as hell not on my first go.
C'mon, that ruins the game, bro.
Ah to hell with it, guess the "Elite Engineering Suit" will hafta to be left out.
Great "update", now instead of crashing at the door in chapter 7, it just crashes randomly. Thanks!

"Save games will now be recorded, and deducted, properly when playing the Single Player Campaign in Hardcore mode."

This is true, but unfortunately, the hardcore mode rewards do not unlock unless you play the entire game from start to finish without exiting to the main menu.  I hope there's another patch and Fairlight update to implement it, but I won't hold my breath.
the update notes say that there's suits unlocked in the first store.  you can play the game "for real" without the extra weapons and suits, it's not going to magically force you to buy them.
